|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SST;SST25VF032B; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SanDisk;SDPA3AD-008G; |flash2size = 8192 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16GG-AC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = ASIX;AX88772; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 70:71:BC |oui = 74:F0:6D

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-NU706H |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half, USB) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3070; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Linux kernel that is a derivative of Ubuntu Maverick (10.10) *Linux installation and support for EFIKA MX is available here: :http://www.powerdeveloper.org/platforms/efikamx/linux
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX515 @800MHz :MCIMX515D Single-core [[ARM]] (Cortex-A8) :3D GPU, WXGA Display support (HDMI) :Multi-format HD hardware Video decoder *512MB RAM, 8GB ''SanDisk'' SSD (internal) *802.11bgn Wi-Fi, 10/100 Mbps Ethernet *2x USB 2.0 ports, HDMI, SDHC Card reader *Audio jacks for headset, Built-in speaker *Size: 160 x 115 x 20 mm, Weight: 250 grams
[[Category:English Documentation]]
